Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, didn't see you there. I was pretty
deep in thought about these ruins.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hi there.


I was captivated by the sight of the ruins
in the glowing daylight.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hi there.


I was captivated by the sight of the ruins
glistening in the rain.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hi there.


I was captivated by the sight of the ruins
in the setting light.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>These ruins are very unusual.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>They're unique among all the ruins that
our survey team has discovered. On the
surface, at least.
We need to investigate it fully, but most
of the team is at the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>. We're
stretched thin these days.
We'll have to make do. The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>
are <clr:0000>very important<clr:ffff>, after all.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hi there.


I was captivated by the sight of the ruins
in the moonlight.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>See those ruins over yonder? Those are
the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>—at least the ones we can
see from here. Impressive, right?
But the ones here are important too.
Unique among all the ruins!

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Still, ever since the Zonai Survey Team
found <clr:0000>stone slabs inscribed with Zonai
text<clr:ffff> at the Ring Ruins...
our leader has been spending all of his
time there, and he took most of the team
with him.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those ruins fell all over <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>,
far off in the Necluda region to the
southeast.
They're called the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> because,
well, they're still partially intact and are
in the shape of rings.
You can't see them from here, but climb
up high at Lookout Landing and you
can make them out on the horizon.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>But these ruins here are special too.
Truly unique...

Still, the Ring Ruins hold something
mysterious that's got the attention of
the Zonai Survey Team's leader.
He's there looking into <clr:0000>stone slabs
inscribed with Zonai text<clr:ffff>, and he took
most of our team with him.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Those ruins fell all over <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.


The village used to be a quiet place,
and kind of isolated up in the mountains.
Almost a secret in some ways.
That's all changed. It's far busier now.
All sorts of people go there to see
what's happened.
Talk_36:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though, I guess I'm lucky that I get to investigate
ruins this important all on my own without anyone
here to bother me.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You sure are interested in this ruin,
aren't you?

Well, right now, most of the survey team
is far away at the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The whole team is stretched thin, so our
research here is slower than I'd like.

We'll have to make do. The <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>
are <clr:0000>very important<clr:ffff>, after all.
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Even if people saw someone at the castle,
I kind of doubt it was Princess Zelda...

Unfortunately, it's too far to see from
here.<sp:5:1:0> You'd probably need a telescope
to get a good look, really.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sleep>I will be the one—<sp:5:1:0>the one <sp:5:0:0>who solves<sp:5:0:0> the
riddle of <sp:5:1:0>our local ruins.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, hi there.


I was captivated by the sight of the ruins
in the gentle morning light.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was prepared for plenty of danger when
I joined the Zonai Survey Team.

But that doesn't mean that scary things
aren't still scary, you know?
